The state has awarded a more than $250 million contract to refurbish the historic Longfellow bridge and $292 million contract to replace the I-95 Whittier Bridge over the Merrimack River.

Tumbleweeds invade Texas home

A brutal storm system that brought 19 inches of snow to some areas of West Texas has delivered something entirely different to one homeowner - winds in excess of 60 mph pushed hundreds of tumbleweeds against a Midland home.
